summary: This simple mod replaces Vyrthur's cuirass with a recolored version of Rsijic robe. You can choose heavy armor verrsion or one with no armor rating, in English or Russian.
descriptionHtml:
It seemed wrong to me that Vyrthur wears armor. I mean he's a mage who even doesn't let you to come close... So I basically made this mod for myself but decided to share it.

There are 4 files. Those which are named "falmer" contain the robe without armor rate, other two are heavy armor identical to his vanilla ivory cuirass so you don't feel cheating.

There is still a set of ivory armor that you can retrieve. I've hidden it in some chest in the Inner sanctuary... I don't know which exactly. Vyrthur is also still wearing his ivory boots and gauntlets.

Shold work fine but let me know if it doesn't.

WARNING! Don't download heavy armor version, English or Russian. There can be one stupid mistake and I should check it. If you downloaded English version without armor rating, try to re-download it in order to avoid having naked Vyrthur. It should be fine now.
author: Tellur123
